meanings.definition: A game similar to ice hockey, played with a straight stick and a rubber ring.
meanings.sent1: The children played ringettes on the frozen pond.
meanings.sent2: She scored a goal in the ringettes match last night.
meanings.sent3: The penguins decided to have a friendly match of ringettes on the ice.
meanings.sent4: The ringettes game was a battlefield of skill and strategy.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ringettes hitting the ice echoed through the arena.
